== Introduction ==
The one and only focus is to spread the word of <nowiki>[[StartUbuntu]]</nowiki> and promoting the use of Linux. Spreading the word could be anything, any type of activities '''YOU''' think it could help :)

* If English is your 2nd language and you do speak another language, it would be great to write an article or anything using your native language and publish that.
* Social Media (Facebook, Twitter, Google+, etc)
* Real-Life Events
* Invite your friends, colleagues, family, etc to see Linux (Ubuntu and its flavours)
* If you do have a Blog, why not add some posts about the project?
* If you have a personal website, it would be so nice of you to add the banner of the project to your website
* Contacting some magazines
* Approaching Schools, Colleges and Universities
* ANYTHING that might help to spread the word is more than welcome and needed :)

== Social Media ==

Please, read <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/startubuntu/+spec/social-media-channels | this Blueprint]]</nowiki>.

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/StartUbuntu#Social_Media | List of StartUbuntu Social Media is here]]</nowiki>.

==== Give away LiveCD/LiveDVD/LiveUSB ====
<nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/startubuntu/+spec/giveaway-livecds-livedvds | One of the ideas]]</nowiki> for StartUbuntu Project is to give away LiveCDs, LiveDVDs and/or LiveUSB for people. If you have done that, please share your activities under this section:
